---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(plotly)
library(flexdashboard)

```

```{r}
data(rest_inspec)

korean_df = rest_inspec %>%
            filter(str_detect(cuisine_description, "Korean"))

```

Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Chart A

```{r}

korean_df %>%
  filter(dba %in% c("DANJI", "JONGRO BBQ", "CHO DANG GOL", "GAMMEEOK", "TAKE 31")) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~dba, y = ~score, color = ~dba, type = "box", colors =   "viridis") %>%
  layout(title = "Distribution of scores for favorite restaurants", xaxis = list(title ="Restaurant name"), yaxis = list(title="Score"))


```


Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
### Chart B

```{r}

korean_df %>%
  filter(str_detect(critical_flag, "Critical")) %>%
  drop_na(score) %>%
  group_by(grade_date, boro, dba) %>%
  summarise(avg_score = mean(score)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~grade_date, y = ~avg_score, type = "scatter", mode = "lines", color = ~boro, colors = "viridis") %>%
  layout(title = "Average score by borough from 2014-2017", xaxis = list(title ="Date"), yaxis = list(title="Average score"))

```


### Chart C

```{r}

korean_df %>%
  mutate(boro = fct_infreq(boro)) %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~boro, y = ~grade, color = ~grade, type = "histogram", colors =   "viridis") %>%
  layout(title = "Distribution of grade by boroughs", xaxis = list(title ="Borough"), yaxis = list(title="Count"))


```
